channel.title: Help with command to make mod/admins
channel.description: I want a command to make a player a mod/admin but i don't know how and i'm using the file name one. this is the path. "./data/administrators.txt" and make player rights 3 only so the admin only can make them administrators and "/data/moderators.txt" is for mods its just to add a name to the file not change the player rights.

item.source: Help with command to make mod/admins

item.title: Help with command to make mod/admins
item.dc:creator: @Corruptive Corruptive
item.description:
@Corruptive wrote:

if(command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Name")) { String name = command.substring(4); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 1; c.sendMessage("Your name just made you mod !!!"); }

if(command.startsWith("admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { String name = command.substring(6); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 2; c.sendMessage("YourName just made you admin !!!"); }

if(command.startsWith("undo") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YourName")) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.playerRights = 0; c.sendMessage("You didn't payed so no admin or mod anymore ... ! behave !"); }

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2007, 12:11:57 PM[/size][hr]Eh that curley bracer goes with it on the end of the mod command one = \

Read full topic
item.source: Help with command to make mod/admins

item.title: Help with command to make mod/admins
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

Here:

In commands section in client.java (to get there search pickup)

Below that instert this:

} if(command.startsWith("givestaff") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now Staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is now admin"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } } else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff, admin, or moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
